contentType: [integration, reference]

# Google Drive node

Use the Google Drive node to automate work in Google Drive, and integrate Google Drive with other applications. n8n has built-in support for a wide range of Google Drive features, including creating, updating, listing, deleting, and getting drives, files, and folders. 

On this page, you'll find a list of operations the Google Drive node supports and links to more resources.

/// note | Credentials
Refer to [Google Drive credentials](/integrations/builtin/credentials/google/index.md) for guidance on setting up authentication. 
///

## Operations

* **File**
    * [**Copy**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/file-operations.md#copy-a-file) a file
    * [**Create from text**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/file-operations.md#create-from-text)
    * [**Delete**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/file-operations.md#delete-a-file) a file
    * [**Download**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/file-operations.md#download-a-file) a file
    * [**Move**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/file-operations.md#move-a-file) a file
    * [**Share**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/file-operations.md#share-a-file) a file
    * [**Update**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/file-operations.md#update-a-file) a file
    * [**Upload**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/file-operations.md#upload-a-file) a file
* **File/Folder**
    * [**Search**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/file-folder-operations.md#search-files-and-folders) files and folders
* **Folder**
    * [**Create**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/folder-operations.md#create-a-folder) a folder
    * [**Delete**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/folder-operations.md#delete-a-folder) a folder
    * [**Share**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/folder-operations.md#share-a-folder) a folder
* **Shared Drive**
    * [**Create**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/shared-drive-operations.md#create-a-shared-drive) a shared drive
    * [**Delete**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/shared-drive-operations.md#delete-a-shared-drive) a shared drive
    * [**Get**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/shared-drive-operations.md#get-a-shared-drive) a shared drive
    * [**Get Many**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/shared-drive-operations.md#get-many-shared-drives) shared drives
    * [**Update**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/shared-drive-operations.md#update-a-shared-drive) a shared drive

## Templates and examples

## Common issues

For common questions or issues and suggested solutions, refer to [Common issues](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/common-issues.md).

properties_schema.description: The name of the shared drive to create

options.name: canAddChildren
options.description: Whether the current user can add children to folders in this shared drive

options.displayName: Can Change Copy Requires Writer Permission Restriction
options.name: canChangeCopyRequiresWriterPermissionRestriction
options.description: Whether the current user can change the copyRequiresWriterPermission restriction of this shared drive

options.displayName: Can Change Domain Users Only Restriction
options.name: canChangeDomainUsersOnlyRestriction
options.description: Whether the current user can change the domainUsersOnly restriction of this shared drive

options.name: canChangeDriveBackground
options.description: Whether the current user can change the background of this shared drive

options.displayName: Can Change Drive Members Only Restriction
options.name: canChangeDriveMembersOnlyRestriction
options.description: Whether the current user can change the driveMembersOnly restriction of this shared drive

options.name: canComment
options.description: Whether the current user can comment on files in this shared drive

options.name: canCopy
options.description: Whether the current user can copy files in this shared drive

options.name: canDeleteChildren
options.description: Whether the current user can delete children from folders in this shared drive

options.name: canDeleteDrive
options.description: Whether the current user can delete this shared drive. Attempting to delete the shared drive may still fail if there are untrashed items inside the shared drive.

options.name: canDownload
options.description: Whether the current user can download files in this shared drive

options.name: canEdit
options.description: Whether the current user can edit files in this shared drive

options.name: canListChildren
options.description: Whether the current user can list the children of folders in this shared drive

options.name: canManageMembers
options.description: Whether the current user can add members to this shared drive or remove them or change their role

options.name: canReadRevisions
options.description: Whether the current user can read the revisions resource of files in this shared drive

options.name: canRename
options.description: Whether the current user can rename files or folders in this shared drive

options.name: canRenameDrive
options.description: Whether the current user can rename this shared drive

options.name: canShare
options.description: Whether the current user can share files or folders in this shared drive

options.name: canTrashChildren
options.description: Whether the current user can trash children from folders in this shared drive

options.name: colorRgb
options.description: The color of this shared drive as an RGB hex string

options.name: hidden
options.description: Whether the shared drive is hidden from default view

options.name: adminManagedRestrictions
options.description: Whether the options to copy, print, or download files inside this shared drive, should be disabled for readers and commenters. When this restriction is set to true, it will override the similarly named field to true for any file inside this shared drive.

options.name: copyRequiresWriterPermission
options.description: Whether the options to copy, print, or download files inside this shared drive, should be disabled for readers and commenters. When this restriction is set to true, it will override the similarly named field to true for any file inside this shared drive.

options.name: domainUsersOnly
options.description: Whether access to this shared drive and items inside this shared drive is restricted to users of the domain to which this shared drive belongs. This restriction may be overridden by other sharing policies controlled outside of this shared drive.

options.name: driveMembersOnly
options.description: Whether access to items inside this shared drive is restricted to its members

properties_schema.name: driveId
properties_schema.description: The shared drive to delete

properties_schema.name: driveId
properties_schema.description: The shared drive to get

options.name: useDomainAdminAccess
options.description: Whether to issue the request as a domain administrator; if set to true, then the requester will be granted access if they are an administrator of the domain to which the shared drive belongs

properties_schema.name: returnAll
properties_schema.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties_schema.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: propertiesUi
options.description: A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are visible to all apps

values.name: key
values.description: Name of the key to add

values.name: value
values.description: Value to set for the key

options.name: keepRevisionForever
options.description: Whether to set the 'keepForever' field in the new head revision. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Google Drive. Only 200 revisions for the file can be kept forever. If the limit is reached, try deleting pinned revisions.

options.name: ocrLanguage
options.description: A language hint for OCR processing during image import (ISO 639-1 code)

options.name: useContentAsIndexableText
options.description: Whether to use the uploaded content as indexable text

options.name: convertToGoogleDocument
options.description: Whether to create a Google Document (instead of the .txt default format)
options.hint: Google Docs API has to be enabled in the Google API Console.

properties_schema.name: fileId
properties_schema.description: The file to download

options.name: binaryPropertyName
options.description: Use this field name in the following nodes, to use the binary file data
options.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

values.name: docsToFormat
values.description: Format used to export when downloading Google Docs files

values.name: drawingsToFormat
values.description: Format used to export when downloading Google Drawings files

values.name: slidesToFormat
values.description: Format used to export when downloading Google Slides files

values.name: sheetsToFormat
values.description: Format used to export when downloading Google Sheets files

options.name: fileName
options.description: File name. Ex: data.pdf.

properties_schema.name: fileId
properties_schema.description: The file to move

properties_schema.name: driveId
properties_schema.description: The drive where to move the file

properties_schema.description: The folder where to move the file

properties_schema.name: fileId
properties_schema.description: The file to share

values.name: role
values.description: Defines what users can do with the file or folder

values.name: type
values.description: The scope of the permission. A permission with type=user applies to a specific user whereas a permission with type=domain applies to everyone in a specific domain.

values.name: emailAddress
values.description: The email address of the user or group to which this permission refers

values.name: domain
values.description: The domain to which this permission refers

values.name: allowFileDiscovery
values.description: Whether to allow the file to be discovered through search

options.name: emailMessage
options.description: A plain text custom message to include in the notification email

options.name: moveToNewOwnersRoot
options.description:
This parameter only takes effect if the item is not in a shared drive and the request is attempting to transfer the ownership of the item.

When set to true, the item is moved to the new owner's My Drive root folder and all prior parents removed.

options.name: sendNotificationEmail
options.description: Whether to send a notification email when sharing to users or groups

options.name: transferOwnership
options.description: Whether to transfer ownership to the specified user and downgrade the current owner to a writer

options.name: useDomainAdminAccess
options.description: Whether to perform the operation as domain administrator, i.e. if you are an administrator of the domain to which the shared drive belongs, you will be granted access automatically.

properties_schema.description: The file to update

properties_schema.name: changeFileContent
properties_schema.description: Whether to send a new binary data to update the file

properties_schema.description: Find the name of input field containing the binary data to update the file in the Input panel on the left, in the Binary tab

properties_schema.name: newUpdatedFileName
properties_schema.description: If not specified, the file name will not be changed

properties_schema.name: searchMethod
properties_schema.description: Whether to search for the file/folder name or use a query string

properties_schema.name: queryString
properties_schema.description: The name of the file or folder to search for. Returns also files and folders whose names partially match this search term.

properties_schema.name: queryString
properties_schema.description: Use the Google query strings syntax to search for a specific set of files or folders. Learn more.

properties_schema.name: returnAll
properties_schema.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties_schema.name: limit
properties_schema.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: driveId

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Google Drive Drive URL

modes.name: id
modes.hint: The ID of the shared drive

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Google Drive Drive ID

options.description: The drive you want to search in. By default, the personal "My Drive" is used.

options.name: folderId

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Google Drive Folder URL
Not a valid Google Drive Folder ID

options.description: The folder you want to search in. By default, the root folder of the drive is used. If you select a folder other than the root folder, only the direct children will be included.

options.name: fileTypes
options.description: Return only items corresponding to the selected MIME types

options.name: All
options.description: Return all file types

options.name: fileTypes
options.description: Return only items corresponding to the selected MIME types

options.name: All
options.description: Return all file types

options.name: includeTrashed
options.description: Whether to return also items in the Drive's bin

options.name: fields

options.description: All fields
The fields to return

options.description: Whether to delete the folder immediately. If false, the folder will be moved to the trash.

properties_schema.description: The folder to share
